description: The story of the fight to save forest resources from wildfire by using planning, research, training and experience. Also details the need for technology, surveillance, strategy, equipment, systems and co-operation. Describes co-operative fire control - federal, state and local - to protect the nation's water supply, timber, wildlife, recreation and scenic wonders as well as property and lives.
